meanings.definition: The quality of being easily perceived or recognized.
meanings.sent1: The distinctness of the sound made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The distinctness of her voice stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The distinctness of the cat's meow made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The distinctness of the colors in the painting was striking.
meanings.sent5: The distinctness of the smell lingered in the room.

meanings.definition: A clear difference or contrast between two things.
meanings.sent1: There was a distinctness in the flavors of the two dishes.
meanings.sent2: The distinctness between the two fabrics was evident.
meanings.sent3: The distinctness in their heights made them look funny together.
meanings.sent4: The distinctness in their opinions created a rift between them.
meanings.sent5: The distinctness in their personalities made them a perfect match.

meanings.definition: The state of being separate or different from something else.
meanings.sent1: The distinctness of her style set her apart from the others.
meanings.sent2: The distinctness of the boundary was clear on the map.
meanings.sent3: The distinctness of the cat's meow made it seem like it was talking.
meanings.sent4: The distinctness of her decision was like drawing a line in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The distinctness of the flavors danced on his taste buds.
